p: At the same time, according to our knowledge, there is no literature data on the content of triple-helix β-glucans in the fruiting bodies of the Suillus and Lactarius genus. However, there are several publications available confirming the therapeutic properties of polysaccharides with the structure of β-glucans isolated from Lactarius deliciosus [ 72, 73]. The content of β-glucans determined by the Congo red method in wild and commercial cultivated mushrooms in our study is similar to the results of other authors [ 29, 73, 74].
